[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=334563][color=#000000][b]FiÏ„is[/b][/color][/url] was banned for "Leaking and blackmail is not allowed on here. You should have known that."
[/list]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2774521][img]https://i.imgur.com/uvrVZ20.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Announcements[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6176743][b]Hacktvism Forum Section[/b][/url] - [mention=1]
Have you heard of Hacktivism? Perhaps it is one of your interests. If you would like to see a forum section for the topic, be sure to let Omniscision know on his thread.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Informational Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6177232][b]China tests new space capability with hypersonic missile[/b][/url] - [mention=2682887]
Nuclear weapons are one of the most powerful weapons of mass destruction that a country can use. China has been testing nuclear-capable hypersonic missiles and has reportedly "made astounding progress" while being "more advanced than US officials realized."
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Entertaining Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6170720][b]Warriors: Month of Madness[/b][/url] - [mention=5002443]
The official Hack Forums group Warriors are hosting a series of fun events to celebrate Octoberfest. Whether you want to take part in the Hack Forums trivia, or just want a chance to win an upgrade, be sure to check it out.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6177017][b]What's your go-to comfort food?[/b][/url] - [mention=3708686]
Everyone has a favorite, something that you might crave more often than most. What do you opt for when you might be feeling down? Share your favorite comfort food on the thread. Who knows, maybe someone has the same one as you.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6175914][b]Worst lounge thread in the past week.[/b][/url] - [mention=619030]
With the Octoberfest award being released, there was a surge of activity in the lounge. Some threads have been more questionable than others. Did one stand out to you as being significantly worse? Make sure to stop by iNviZ's thread to share your thoughts.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Contests & Giveaways[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6174734][b][Lions League] 100k Bytes Contest | Open To Everyone | 6 Winners | Ends 01-11-21[/b][/url] - [mention=420]
Lions League is back with the eighth installment to their series of monthly contests. This time, there are 100,000 bytes up for grabs, split among 6 different winners.
[/list]

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1255039][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/technews-device.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Windows 11 Released[/color][/b]
Microsoft had previously stated that Windows 10 would be the final version of the most popular operating system. Windows, representing a whooping 71 percent share of the PC, tablet, and console market. However, Windows 11 is taking the world by storm with its brand new features, such as app snapping, creating custom windows layouts, a revamped Microsoft Store, and future support for running Android applications natively. Bugs have been reported, some users having trouble upgrading to the latest version, the start menu not functioning correctly, or a decrease in performance of up to 15% on machines using AMD processors. You can upgrade to Windows 11 for free from Windows 10. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.techradar.com/news/windows-11-home-and-pro#:~:text=There%20are%20improvements%20across%20the,is%20now%20renamed%20the%20dock]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Netflix Gaming[/color][/b]
Netflix has just announced the acquisition of Night School Studio, the game developer and publisher that created OXENFREE. Netflix is making ad-free licensed and original mobile games for subscribers, allowing them to play their favorite characters from films or series available on the platform for free. This expansion represents the company's most significant advance in a new kind of entertainment since it began streaming in 2007. The Twitter account Netflix Geeked stated that Netflix games were already available on Android phones in Poland, Spain, and Italy. Two of these games being Stranger Things 1984 and Stranger Things 3: The Game. What Netflix series would you like to see adapted into a video game? [i][size=x-small][url=https://techcrunch.com/2021/09/28/netflix-is-launching-a-trio-of-members-only-casual-games-in-poland-italy-and-spain/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Twitch Hacked[/color][/b]
On Tuesday, October 5, a hacker declared to have stolen sensitive information from the streaming platform. He claimed to have in his possession some of the site's source code, SDKs, the history of payments made to streamers, and unreleased software and tools used by the company's security team. He also said that other data had been stolen and that the information released is only the "first part." Passwords have not been leaked, even though some users were asked to change theirs following the data breach. These events follow weeks of protests for twitch to improve its service, the main reason being the lack of action against bot-driven "hate raids." [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theverge.com/2021/10/6/22712365/twitch-data-leak-breach-security-confirmation-comments]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]
